description: AI Powered Legal Education and Research. Ask Abe is a legal research and education tool that uses AI to help you better understand the complexities of the law.
title: Ask Abe
introduction: Ask Abe is an educational tool that helps users navigate complex legal frameworks and provides detailed legal information. It is a conversational AI that users can ask legal questions to and receive legal information with direct citations to primary source legislation.
features: Provides detailed legal information with direct citations to primary source legislation
Clarification question answer options with multiple choice
targetPeople: Individuals seeking to understand legal frameworks and obtain legal information

faqs.question: What is Ask Abe?
faqs.answer: Ask Abe is an educational tool that helps users navigate complex legal frameworks and provides detailed legal information. It is a conversational AI that users can ask legal questions to and receive legal information with direct citations to primary source legislation.

faqs.question: Is Ask Abe free to use?
faqs.answer: Yes, Ask Abe is committed to keeping this invaluable tool free forever.

faqs.question: Can I choose the jurisdiction for the legal information?
faqs.answer: Yes, you can select from which jurisdiction you would like Abe to focus his answer. More jurisdictions are coming soon.

faqs.question: Can I ask follow-up questions?
faqs.answer: Yes, when Abe gives you an answer to your original query, you can ask a follow-up question if you have more questions.

faqs.question: What if the clarifying question doesn't apply to me?
faqs.answer: If the clarifying question doesn't apply, you can click 'not applicable', or if none of the answers suit your needs, you can write your own custom response.
